name: Rumbling Tactics
description:
Rumbling Tactics is a short tower defense game with the Löve2d game engine, for the Löve Jam 2022. I made this project essentially to learn löve and experiment other things than unity.

In a world at war, your base has been invaded by enemies. A rescue ship is here to gather all the citizens and evacuate them, and you are a commander who manage the defense through a computer screen.

  • Use the left click to build turrets on the map that will defend the ship, until all citizens are gathered. Killing enemies make you gain money in order to build stronger turrets.
  • Use the right/left arrows to switch the current turret profile.

None of the assets in the project are mine, i used free game resources you can find on itchio or else. Here's the list, thank you all for all the awesome assets !

  • Space Breaker by zintoki (itch.io)
  • Hit effects by Lil Cthulhu (itch.io)
  • Tech Dungeon: Roguelite - Asset Pack by Pupkin (itch.io)
  • Ground Shaker by zintoki (itch.io)
  • 300+ Futuristic SFX with names (strategy game sound effects) by GameSupplyGuy (itch.io)
  • Shapeforms Audio Free Sound Effects by Shapeforms (itch.io)
